title: The Trick To Breaking Through Any Plateau
description:
Jillian checks in on what’s been going on for the gang. Plus, random tips from sunscreen to hair loss, and a caller who has hit a plateau in his weight loss.


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Promo code from this episode: AlayaNaturals.com, JMPOD 15% off
